data.title: The Presets 'Ghosts' by Abteen Bagheri | Videos
data.meta_description: In a timely echo of the sporting excellence we've been enjoying all summer, Abteen Bagheri embraces some Olympic spirit for his video for The Presets' …
data.text: In a timely echo of the sporting excellence we've been enjoying all summer, Abteen Bagheri embraces some Olympic spirit for his video for The Presets' Ghosts, featuring the next generation of Tom Daleys on the diving board... In a timely echo of the sporting excellence we've been enjoying all summer, Abteen Bagheri embraces some Olympic spirit for his video for The Presets' Ghosts, featuring the next generation of Tom Daleys on the diving board... Abteen travelled to Sydney - The Presets' hometown - to shoot the video, with the slow motion diving footage influenced by the innovative techniques employed by the deeply controversial German filmmaker Leni Riefenstahl in her film Olympia, about the 1936 Berlin Olympics. Most of the divers are young teenagers - some as young as 14 years old. And as Abteen points out in the Behind The Scenes film of the Ghosts video, "When they're on the ground they look like kids, but when they're on the boards they look way beyond their years..." http://www.youtube.com/watchv=Di5AT4MI6BY&feature=youtu.be Abteen travelled to Sydney - The Presets' hometown - to shoot the video, with the slow motion diving footage influenced by the innovative techniques employed by the deeply controversial German filmmaker Leni Riefenstahl in her film Olympia, about the 1936 Berlin Olympics. In a timely echo of the sporting excellence we've been enjoying all summer, Abteen Bagheri embraces some Olympic spirit for his video for The Presets' Ghosts, featuring the next generation of Tom Daleys on the diving board... Abteen travelled to Sydney - The Presets' hometown - to shoot the video, with the slow motion diving footage influenced by the innovative techniques employed by the deeply controversial German filmmaker Leni Riefenstahl in her film Olympia, about the 1936 Berlin Olympics. Most of the divers are young teenagers - some as young as 14 years old. And as Abteen points out in the Behind The Scenes film of the Ghosts video, "When they're on the ground they look like kids, but when they're on the boards they look way beyond their years..." http://www.youtube.com/watchv=Di5AT4MI6BY&feature=youtu.be Most of the divers are young teenagers - some as young as 14 years old.
